Class ComparableCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeometricObject
      • ComparableCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GeometricObject>

    public class ComparableCircle
extends GeometricObject
    The following class is used to build a circle that can be compared, implementing the abstract methods in the geometric object class and the comparable interface.
